page.title: 19Life-Styles
page.content: There are 2{PUBLIC HOUSES}in the centre of Wolvey. One is called the Blue Pig and the other is called the Bull. The Bull was built 20 years ago and is owned by Marstons the{ BREWERS.}The Pub is open from 11.30am.-2.30pm. and 6.00pm.-11.00pm. They have an average of 150 customers a day. A pint of{BEER in the lounge costs 75p and a glass of lemonade costs 40p. The Blue Pig stands just across the road from the Square down Hall Road and has been there since the 15th century. {FOOD}is now served in pubs and this has increased their popularity for an evening out.
